titleStmt.title: God's revenge against murther demonstrated in the apprehension, prosecution & execution of Henry Symbal and William Jones, for the inhumane murther of Richard Sandford Baronet, murthered by them the 8th of Septemb., 1675.
titleStmt.author: Tonge, John, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Tonge. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
